title: Chapter 1824 - Pretending To Be A Pig To Eat A Dragon

Chapter 1824 - Pretending To Be A Pig To Eat A Dragon

Before Su Yi could ask any further questions, the golden-robed man’s body split into pieces, dissolved into a rain of chaos light, and disappeared.

At the same time, spatial power enveloped Su Yi, and the scenery shifted around him. He soon found himself in the world of the second step of the Dragon Ascension Platform.

A fiery chaos space came into view. Searing flames whooshed toward him, transforming into countless wondrous and inscrutable fiery “raindrops.”

Boom!

The moment Su Yi appeared, the surging flames condensed into a well-built, valiant man with a prominent mustache. His eyes blazed like twin suns, and he was covered in dazzlingly bright armor seemingly forged out of molten lava. When he breathed, he spat fire from his mouth and nostrils.    

His blazing, tyrannical aura left even Su Yi unwittingly stunned.

The valiant man was also a Miracle Realm avatar of will, but he was obviously stronger than the golden-robed man Su Yi had fought before.

“How about we… talk first?” asked Su Yi. He was curious. Just which ancestor of the dragon race had left his avatar of will here?
